title: The Red Badge of Courage (Part 11)
description: Henry fights heroically in a fresh battle. Afterward, he and Wilson are deeply offended when they overhear an officer say their regiment fights "like a bunch of mule drivers." The men prepare to make a desperate charge that few expect to survive.
meta: Use the Reading strategy of retelling to better understand a text
